statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 10;
SELECT amount, sender_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE gas_used > 1000;
SELECT receiver_address, amount, gas_used FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount >= 50;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0xabc123' AND receiver_address = '0xdef456';
SELECT block_number, gas_used FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_hash = '0x12345abcdef';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY block_number DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE gas_used > 1000
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, gas_used FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY gas_used ASC
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, sender_address, receiver_address, gas_used FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount >= 100 AND gas_used < 500
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, block_number, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789abcdef' OR receiver_address = '0xabcdef123456789' ORDER BY transaction_id
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, block_id, transaction_hash FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = 1000;
SELECT anomaly_id, anomaly_description, anomaly_type FROM transaction_anomalies LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT transaction_hash, sender_address, receiver_address, transaction_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123abc' AND receiver_address = '0x456def' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT bt.transaction_id, ta.anomaly_description, ta.detected_at FROM blockchain_transactions bt JOIN transaction_anomalies ta ON bt.transaction_id = ta.transaction_id ORDER BY ta.detected_at ASC;
SELECT block_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_id HAVING total_transactions > 5;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, block_number FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY block_number DESC;
SELECT miner_id, miner_address, mining_power FROM block_miners WHERE mining_pool = 'BTC';
SELECT participant_id, participant_address, role FROM transaction_participants WHERE role = 'sender';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT bt.transaction_id, bt.transaction_hash, count(tp.participant_id) as participants_count FROM blockchain_transactions bt LEFT JOIN transaction_participants tp ON bt.transaction_id = tp.transaction_id GROUP BY bt.transaction_id, bt.transaction_hash ORDER BY participants_count DESC;
SELECT bm.miner_address, COUNT(*) as blocks_mined FROM block_miners bm JOIN blockchain_transactions bt ON bm.miner_id = bt.transaction_id GROUP BY bm.miner_address ORDER BY blocks_mined DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_participants tp WHERE tp.role = 'sender' ORDER BY participant_address ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number = 100;
SELECT transaction_type, fee, status FROM transaction_details WHERE fee < 10;
SELECT metadata_id, metadata_type, metadata_value FROM transaction_metadata WHERE metadata_type = 'description';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT block_number, timestamp, sender_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_number > 1000;
SELECT transaction_type, fee, status FROM transaction_details WHERE fee > 50.00;
SELECT block_number, block_hash, miner_address FROM block_details ORDER BY block_number DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT bt.transaction_id, bt.sender_address, tm.metadata_type, tm.metadata_value FROM blockchain_transactions bt INNER JOIN transaction_metadata tm ON bt.transaction_id = tm.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT block_id, num_transactions, miner_address, timestamp FROM block_details ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, block_id, anomaly_type, timestamp FROM anomaly_log WHERE anomaly_type = 'Suspicious';
SELECT address_id, address, total_transactions, total_amount_received, total_amount_sent FROM address_history WHERE total_transactions > 10;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = '0xABCDEF' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT block_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY block_id HAVING num_transactions > 5 ORDER BY num_transactions DESC;
SELECT address, total_transactions, total_amount_sent FROM address_history WHERE total_amount_sent > total_amount_received ORDER BY total_amount_sent DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM pattern_recognition WHERE pattern_name LIKE '%fraud%' ORDER BY pattern_id ASC;
